data.message: Do u have an online claim agent named Radcliff David Keith he claims to b an online agent . About an international lottery from face book. If not i figured u would like to know who is scaming u now

replies.message: Hey Brian, this sounds like a hoax message. We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us by using these tips: http://bit.ly/1Muu96f. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Jordan
Thank u and i will thanks. And i never give out personal info over the internet
